attributes.action: Ensure a change in party leader triggers a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should not be able to engineer the next Prime Minister of the country.  If the prime minister does not wish to carry on to complete their term in office, a general election should be called.

Otherwise there is no democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
